title: Add batch triangular factorization and solves
body_html:
Hi, this PR is not ready, but I would like to open it to get the conversation started and to keep a list of things we need to do to get this merged in. This contains batch triangular (LU) factorization and solves that our new QP PyTorch library qpth needs. It provides this by calling into cuBLAS' getR{f,s}Batched funcitons. Here are things I plan to do (and I'll keep this list updated). Is there anything else I should do to help get this merged in?

  • Add a CPU version (is there a way I can do this in Python?)
  • Add tests
  • Add docs
  • Do you prefer btrf and btrs as names or something more memorable?

\cc @zkolter

body:
Hi, this PR is not ready, but I would like to open it to get the conversation started and to keep a list of things we need to do to get this merged in. This contains batch triangular (LU) factorization and solves that our new QP PyTorch library [qpth](https://github.com/locuslab/qpth) needs. It provides this by calling into cuBLAS' `getR{f,s}Batched` funcitons. Here are things I plan to do (and I'll keep this list updated). Is there anything else I should do to help get this merged in?

+ [x] Add a CPU version (is there a way I can do this in Python?)
+ [x] Add tests
+ [x] Add docs
+ [x] Do you prefer `btrf` and `btrs` as names or something more memorable?

\cc @zkolter
